world.question:
Which one is the largest ocean in the World?
(a) Indian
(b) Pacific
(c) Atlantic
(d) Arctic

Dead Sea is located between which two countries?
(a)Jordan and Sudan
(b)Jordan and Israel
(c)Turkey and UAE
(d)UAE and Egypt

Which country gifted the 'Statue of Liberty' to USA in 1886?
(a)French
(b)Canada
(c)Brazil
(d)England

In which ocean 'Bermuda Triangle' region is located?
(a)Atlantic
(b)Indian
(c)Pacific
(d)Arctic

Which one is the largest producer of tea in the World?
(a)China
(b)Sri Lanka
(c)India
(d)Kenya

Where the headquaters of World Wide Fund for Nature (WWF) located?
(a)Canada
(b)Switzerland
(c)Germany
(d)USA

Which country is the largest producer of cotton?
(a)India
(b)Pakistan
(c)Brazil
(d)China

With which of the following books did Arthur Conan Doyle make his literary debut?
(a)A Study in Scarlet 
(b)The Surgeon of Gaster Fell 
(c)The Lost World
(d)The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
